body:
I started a BRAND NEW yt channel. I will be starting a playlist on Avicus shortly, I have some footage but I am a little behind on ending..
It would mean the world to me if you could support me while I post these videos to remind me why I have started to take time out of my day to do this. Click here to subscribe, and it would mean the world to me, looking forward to uploading avicus gameplay soon, much love.

Tell me if the graphics look good enough on my first video by leaving or thumbs up and a comment, and tell be down below some ideas of what to record next <3 <3 <3

Side note: This is my first experience uploading so any tips are welcome, especially ones that help my content.

title: Brand new YT channel
